info.title: Azure Machine Learning Workspaces
info.description: These APIs allow end users to operate on Azure Machine Learning Workspace resources.

get.description: Lists all of the available Azure Machine Learning Workspaces REST API operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

get.description: Gets the currently assigned Workspace Quotas based on VMFamily.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which resource usage is queried.

200.description: OK

post.description: Update quota for each VM family in workspace.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for update quota is queried.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Azure subscription identifier.

200.description: The operation was successful.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: expandChildren

parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which resource usage is queried.

parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

200.description: The response includes a paginated array of Machine Learning computes and a URI to the next set of results, if any. For the more information the limits of the number of items in a resource group, see https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/azure-subscription-service-limits/.

default.description: Error response describing why the request failed.

get.description: Gets compute definition by its name. Any secrets (storage keys, service credentials, etc) are not returned - use 'keys' nested resource to get them.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group in which workspace is located.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Name of Azure Machine Learning workspace.

parameters.name: computeName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Machine Learning compute.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

200.description: Success.

default.description: Error response describing why the request failed.

put.description: Creates or updates compute. This call will overwrite a compute if it exists. This is a nonrecoverable operation. If your intent is to create a new compute, do a GET first to verify that it does not exist yet.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Azure subscription identifier.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: Name of the resource group in which workspace is located.

parameters.name: workspaceName
parameters.description: Name of Azure Machine Learning workspace.

parameters.name: computeName
parameters.description: Name of the Azure Machine Learning compute.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

requestBody.description: Payload with Machine Learning compute definition.

200.description: Compute creation or update initiated.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: URI to poll for asynchronous operation status.

default.description: Error response describing why the request failed.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

parameters.name: underlyingResourceAction
parameters.description: Delete the underlying compute if 'Delete', or detach the underlying compute from workspace if 'Detach'.

200.description: The request was successful; the request was well-formed and received properly.

Location.description: URI to poll for asynchronous operation result.

default.description: Error response describing why the request failed.

patch.description: Updates properties of a compute. This call will overwrite a compute if it exists. This is a nonrecoverable operation.

parameters.description: Version of Azure Machine Learning resource provider API.

200.description: Compute update initiated.

default.description: Error response describing why the request failed.

200.description: The operation was successful. The response contains the list of IP addresses.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

AKS.description: A Machine Learning compute based on AKS.

AksComputeSecrets.description: Secrets related to a Machine Learning compute based on AKS.

adminKubeConfig.description: Content of kubeconfig file that can be used to connect to the Kubernetes cluster.

userKubeConfig.description: Content of kubeconfig file that can be used to connect to the Kubernetes cluster.

dnsServiceIP.description: An IP address assigned to the Kubernetes DNS service. It must be within the Kubernetes service address range specified in serviceCidr.

dockerBridgeCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range assigned to the Docker bridge network. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges or the Kubernetes service address range.

serviceCidr.description: A CIDR notation IP range from which to assign service cluster IPs. It must not overlap with any Subnet IP ranges.

subnetId.description: Virtual network subnet resource ID the compute nodes belong to

allocationState.title: Allocation state.
allocationState.description: Allocation state of the compute. Possible values are: steady - Indicates that the compute is not resizing. There are no changes to the number of compute nodes in the compute in progress. A compute enters this state when it is created and when no operations are being performed on the compute to change the number of compute nodes. resizing - Indicates that the compute is resizing; that is, compute nodes are being added to or removed from the compute.

allocationStateTransitionTime.title: Allocation state transition time.
allocationStateTransitionTime.description: The time at which the compute entered its current allocation state.

currentNodeCount.title: Current node count.
currentNodeCount.description: The number of compute nodes currently assigned to the compute.

errors.title: Errors.
errors.description: Collection of errors encountered by various compute nodes during node setup.

remoteLoginPortPublicAccess.title: Close remote Login Access Port
remoteLoginPortPublicAccess.description: State of the public SSH port. Possible values are: Disabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster. Enabled - Indicates that the public ssh port is open on all nodes of the cluster. NotSpecified - Indicates that the public ssh port is closed on all nodes of the cluster if VNet is defined, else is open all public nodes. It can be default only during cluster creation time, after creation it will be either enabled or disabled.

targetNodeCount.title: Target node count.
targetNodeCount.description: The target number of compute nodes for the compute. If the allocationState is resizing, this property denotes the target node count for the ongoing resize operation. If the allocationState is steady, this property denotes the target node count for the previous resize operation.

nodeState.description: State of the compute node. Values are idle, running, preparing, unusable, leaving and preempted.

port.title: Port.
port.description: SSH port number of the node.

privateIpAddress.title: Private IP address.
privateIpAddress.description: Private IP address of the compute node.

publicIpAddress.title: Public IP address.
publicIpAddress.description: Public IP address of the compute node.

runId.title: Run ID.
runId.description: ID of the Experiment running on the node, if any else null.

AmlComputeNodeInformation.description: Compute node information related to a AmlCompute.

AmlComputeNodesInformation.description: Compute node information related to a AmlCompute.

nodes.description: The collection of returned AmlCompute nodes details.

ClusterUpdateProperties.description: The properties of a amlCompute that need to be updated.

createdOn.description: The date and time when the compute was created.

description.description: The description of the Machine Learning compute.

isAttachedCompute.description: Indicating whether the compute was provisioned by user and brought from outside if true, or machine learning service provisioned it if false.

modifiedOn.description: The date and time when the compute was last modified.

provisioningState.description: The provision state of the cluster. Valid values are Unknown, Updating, Provisioning, Succeeded, and Failed.

resourceId.description: ARM resource id of the underlying compute

ComputeNodesInformation.description: Compute nodes information related to a Machine Learning compute. Might differ for every type of compute.

ComputeResource.description: Machine Learning compute object wrapped into ARM resource envelope.

ComputeSecrets.description: Secrets related to a Machine Learning compute. Might differ for every type of compute.

DatabricksComputeSecrets.description: Secrets related to a Machine Learning compute based on Databricks.

details.description: An array of error detail objects.

address.description: Public IP address of the master node of the cluster.

sshPort.description: Port open for ssh connections on the master node of the cluster.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of AML resource usage information. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of AML resource usage information.

value.description: The list of AML resource usages.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of workspace quota information by VM Family. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of Workspace Quota information.

value.description: The list of Workspace Quotas by VM Family

MachineLearningServiceError.description: Wrapper for error response to follow ARM guidelines.

idleNodeCount.title: Idle node count.
idleNodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes in idle state.

leavingNodeCount.title: Leaving node count.
leavingNodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes which are leaving the amlCompute.

preemptedNodeCount.title: Preempted node count.
preemptedNodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes which are in preempted state.

preparingNodeCount.title: Preparing node count.
preparingNodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes which are being prepared.

runningNodeCount.title: Running node count.
runningNodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes which are running jobs.

unusableNodeCount.title: Unusable node count.
unusableNodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes which are in unusable state.

NodeStateCounts.description: Counts of various compute node states on the amlCompute.

operation.description: The operation that users can perform.

resource.description: The resource on which the operation is performed.

Operation.description: Azure Machine Learning workspace REST API operation

value.description: List of AML workspace operations supported by the AML workspace resource provider.

OperationListResult.description: An array of operations supported by the resource provider.

nextLink.description: A continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

value.description: An array of Machine Learning compute objects wrapped in ARM resource envelope.

PaginatedComputeResourcesList.description: Paginated list of Machine Learning compute objects wrapped in ARM resource envelope.

limit.title: Limit.
limit.description: The maximum permitted quota of the resource.

unit.description: An enum describing the unit of quota measurement.

QuotaBaseProperties.description: The properties for Quota update or retrieval.

location.description: Specifies the location of the resource.

name.description: Specifies the name of the resource.

tags.description: Contains resource tags defined as key/value pairs.

type.description: Specifies the type of the resource.

ResourceId.description: Represents a resource ID. For example, for a subnet, it is the resource URL for the subnet.

localizedValue.description: The localized name of the resource.

limit.title: Limit.
limit.description: The maximum permitted quota of the resource.

unit.description: An enum describing the unit of quota measurement.

ResourceQuota.description: The quota assigned to a resource.

maxNodeCount.description: Max number of nodes to use

minNodeCount.description: Min number of nodes to use

nodeIdleTimeBeforeScaleDown.description: Node Idle Time before scaling down amlCompute

status.description: Enable or disable ssl for scoring

systemServiceType.description: The type of this system service.

SystemService.description: A system service running on a compute.

limit.title: Limit.
limit.description: The maximum permitted quota of the resource.

unit.description: An enum describing the unit of quota measurement.

UpdateWorkspaceQuotas.description: The properties for update Quota response.

nextLink.description: The URI to fetch the next page of workspace quota update result. Call ListNext() with this to fetch the next page of Workspace Quota update result.

value.description: The list of workspace quota update result.

UpdateWorkspaceQuotasResult.description: The result of update workspace quota.

currentValue.description: The current usage of the resource.

limit.description: The maximum permitted usage of the resource.

unit.description: An enum describing the unit of usage measurement.

localizedValue.description: The localized name of the resource.

adminUserName.title: User name.
adminUserName.description: Name of the administrator user account which can be used to SSH to nodes.

adminUserPassword.title: Password.
adminUserPassword.description: Password of the administrator user account.

adminUserSshPublicKey.title: SSH public key.
adminUserSshPublicKey.description: SSH public key of the administrator user account.

UserAccountCredentials.description: Settings for user account that gets created on each on the nodes of a compute.

VirtualMachine.description: A Machine Learning compute based on Azure Virtual Machines.

address.description: Public IP address of the virtual machine.

VirtualMachineSecrets.description: Secrets related to a Machine Learning compute based on AKS.

family.title: Virtual Machine family name
family.description: The family name of the virtual machine size.

gpus.title: Number of gPUs
gpus.description: The number of gPUs supported by the virtual machine size.

lowPriorityCapable.title: Low priority capable
lowPriorityCapable.description: Specifies if the virtual machine size supports low priority VMs.

maxResourceVolumeMB.title: Resource volume size
maxResourceVolumeMB.description: The resource volume size, in MB, allowed by the virtual machine size.

memoryGB.title: Memory size
memoryGB.description: The amount of memory, in GB, supported by the virtual machine size.

name.title: Virtual Machine size name
name.description: The name of the virtual machine size.

osVhdSizeMB.title: OS VHD Disk size
osVhdSizeMB.description: The OS VHD disk size, in MB, allowed by the virtual machine size.

premiumIO.title: Premium IO supported
premiumIO.description: Specifies if the virtual machine size supports premium IO.

vCPUs.title: Number of vPUs
vCPUs.description: The number of vCPUs supported by the virtual machine size.

VirtualMachineSize.description: Describes the properties of a VM size.

amlCompute.description: The list of virtual machine sizes supported by AmlCompute.

VirtualMachineSizeListResult.description: The List Virtual Machine size operation response.

Workspace.description: An object that represents a machine learning workspace.

nextLink.description: The URI that can be used to request the next list of machine learning workspaces.

value.description: The list of machine learning workspaces. Since this list may be incomplete, the nextLink field should be used to request the next list of machine learning workspaces.

WorkspaceListResult.description: The result of a request to list machine learning workspaces.

applicationInsights.description: ARM id of the application insights associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

containerRegistry.description: ARM id of the container registry associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

creationTime.description: The creation time of the machine learning workspace in ISO8601 format.

discoveryUrl.description: Url for the discovery service to identify regional endpoints for machine learning experimentation services

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace. This name in mutable

keyVault.description: ARM id of the key vault associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

provisioningState.description: The current deployment state of workspace resource. The provisioningState is to indicate states for resource provisioning.

storageAccount.description: ARM id of the storage account associated with this workspace. This cannot be changed once the workspace has been created

workspaceId.description: The immutable id associated with this workspace.

WorkspaceProperties.description: The properties of a machine learning workspace.

friendlyName.description: The friendly name for this workspace.

WorkspacePropertiesUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating the properties of a machine learning workspace.

tags.description: The resource tags for the machine learning workspace.

WorkspaceUpdateParameters.description: The parameters for updating a machine learning workspace.
